name: Umbrella Project
description: We need to extract the DNA samples of superhuman.

name: Infiltrate the Mansion
description: From our intelligent source we've found that Mr. X has been in the B123 Mansion in Chimera District. We need to infiltrate and get as much information as possible

name: Take down the Gaurd Silently
description: We have spotted a guard on patrol, blocking our way. We can take down him easily.
